title: League applying patches stuck on 78%
body: League applying patches stuck on 78%, please please can someone give me some useful tips so i can solve this issue.

replies.body:
Problems in the patcher usually boil down to some sort of connection issue or an issue with the installation itself.  To make sure I give you the right troubleshooting steps, could you confirm what sort of issue do you have specifically?  Does the download speed drop to 0kbps and stay there?  Do you get an error?  Does it just get stuck on "applying patches"?

Let me know!
It just gets stuck on "applying patches"

My patcher keeps getting stuck at random percentages for applying patches. *Note every percentage is from a different attempt and downloading the game. For example, I got stuck at 75, then 50, then 51, then finally at 66. I'm currently on a new iMac running OS X Yosemite 10.10.

Hey cell123,

Give the solutions provided in the [**Troubleshooting Patching Issues**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues) thread and let me know if any of that works for you!
